org.epochx.gp.op.mutation
Class PointMutation

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.op.ConfigOperator<GPModel>
      org.epochx.gp.op.mutation.PointMutation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GPMutation, ConfigListener, Listener, Mutation, Operator
public class PointMutation
extends ConfigOperator<GPModel>
implements GPMutation

This class performs a simple point mutation on a GPCandidateProgram.

Each node in the program tree is considered for mutation, with the probability of that node being mutated given as an argument to the PointMutation constructor. If the node does undergo mutation then a replacement node is selected from the full syntax (function and terminal sets), at random.

If a model is provided then the following parameters are loaded upon every configure event:

  • random number generator
  • syntax

If the getModel method returns null then no model is set and whatever static parameters have been set as parameters to the constructor or using the standard accessor methods will be used. If any compulsory parameters remain unset when the mutation is performed then an IllegalStateException will be thrown.

See Also:
SubtreeMutation

PointMutation

public PointMutation(GPModel model)
Construct a point mutation with a default point probability of 0.01. It is generally recommended that the PointMutation(GPModel, double) constructor is used instead.

Parameters:
model - The current controlling model. Parameters such as full syntax will be obtained from this.

PointMutation

public PointMutation(GPModel model,
                     double pointProbability)
Construct a point mutation with user specified point probability.

Parameters:
pointProbability - The probability each node in a selected program has of undergoing a mutation. 1.0 would result in all nodes being changed, and 0.0 would mean no nodes were changed. A typical value would be 0.01.
Method Detail

onConfigure

public void onConfigure()
Configures this operator with parameters from the model.

Specified by:
onConfigure in interface ConfigListener
Overrides:
onConfigure in class ConfigOperator<GPModel>

mutate

public GPCandidateProgram mutate(CandidateProgram p)
Perform point mutation on the given GPCandidateProgram. Each node in the program tree is considered in turn, with each having the given probability of actually being exchanged. Given that a node is chosen then a new function or terminal node of the same arity is used to replace it.

Specified by:
mutate in interface GPMutation
Specified by:
mutate in interface Mutation
Parameters:
p - The GPCandidateProgram selected to undergo this mutation operation.
Returns:
A GPCandidateProgram that was the result of a point mutation on the provided GPCandidateProgram.

getRNG

public RandomNumberGenerator getRNG()
Returns the random number generator that this mutation is using or null if none has been set.

Returns:
the rng the currently set random number generator.

setRNG

public void setRNG(RandomNumberGenerator rng)
Sets the random number generator to use. If a model has been set then this parameter will be overwritten with the random number generator from that model on the next configure event.

Parameters:
rng - the random number generator to set.

getSyntax

public java.util.List<Node> getSyntax()
Returns a List of the Nodes that form the syntax of new program generated with this mutation, or an empty list if none have been set.

Returns:
the types of Node that should be used in constructing new programs.

setSyntax

public void setSyntax(java.util.List<Node> syntax)
Sets the Nodes that should be used to construct new programs. If a model has been set then this parameter will be overwritten with the syntax from that model on the next configure event.

Parameters:
syntax - a List of the types of Node that should be used in constructing new programs.
